title: Intelligent and cost-saving heating: Smart home thermostats in the test
text: The heating period is nearing its end. But right now it may be time to take a sum and think about how to save money next winter while at the same time being more effective and comfortable heating. You want to save money and it should still be warm when you come home? Intelligent heating systems can be the perfect solution. In recent weeks, we have looked at smart radiator thermostats and the systems behind them in more detail, and put 8 different systems to the test.

title: Relaxed, cheap and quick on holiday - Which travel alternative is the best?
text: Diesel scandal, skyrocketing gasoline prices and traffic jams without end - Travelling by car is currently causing a lot of frowns and many question marks for many people. In everyday life, the car is indispensable for many of us. But what alternatives are there?

title: Fake test pages
text: Many consumers seek advice on the Internet before purchasing many products, including Google. In the top 10, however, they often also find fake test sites. Although they give the impression that they have tested products and even select test winners, in reality they did not take part in their own tests.
